summary: The client requested creation of a sprint plan, which was finalized as SP-002 including only US-010 (Mock Login Page) for a focused re-run, with the story status updated to 'In Sprint'. Execution is ready to begin upon confirmation.

decisions.title: Finalize Sprint Plan SP-002
decisions.details: Locked in with only US-010 for a quick, focused re-run.

actions.task: Confirm readiness to start execution of sprint SP-002

backlog_deltas.title: Sprint plan updated successfully with US-010
